text: The Chicago Wolves are an American professional ice hockey team that began playing in 1994. They currently play in the American Hockey League and are the farm team of the Vegas Golden Knights of the NHL. They play their home games in Rosemont, Illinois at the Allstate Arena. Their ECHL affiliate team is the Gwinnett Gladiators. ==Other websites== *Chicago Wolves Official Site Category:American Hockey League teams Category:Ice hockey teams in the United States Category:Vegas Golden Knights Category:1994 establishments in Illinois
title: Chicago Wolves
